statements: UPDATE indie_game_settings SET game_name = 'New Game', setting1 = 'Updated Setting' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE indie_game_settings SET release_date = '2022-05-20', setting3 = 'Custom Setting' WHERE developer_name = 'Example Developer';
UPDATE indie_game_settings SET developer_name='XYZ Studios', setting2='Advanced Mode' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE indie_game_settings SET game_name='New Game', setting1='Easy Mode', setting3='Offline Play' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE GameSettings SET developer = 'Ubisoft' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE GameConfigurations SET configuration_value = 'Medium' WHERE game_id = 2 AND configuration_name = 'Difficulty';
UPDATE GameSettings SET release_date = '2022-11-30', settings = '{"sound": true, "music": false}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE GameConfigurations SET configuration_value = 'High', configuration_name = 'Graphics' WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_value = 'enabled' WHERE setting_name = 'notifications';
UPDATE game_configs SET config_value = '1024x768' WHERE game_id = 1 AND config_name = 'resolution';
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_value = 'updated_value' WHERE setting_name = 'example_setting';
UPDATE game_configs SET config_value = 'new_config_value' WHERE config_name = 'example_config';
UPDATE GameSettings SET developer = 'New Developer', release_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Levels SET required_experience = 500, difficulty_level = 'Medium' WHERE level_id = 3;
UPDATE GameSettings SET developer = 'Rocksteady Studios', release_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE game_name = 'Batman: Arkham Knight';
UPDATE Items SET item_value = 99.99, item_type = 'Armor' WHERE item_name = 'Steel Plate Armor';
UPDATE Game_settings SET setting_value = 'Updated Value' WHERE setting_name = 'Settings 1';
UPDATE Game_profiles SET profile_description = 'New Description' WHERE profile_id = 3;
UPDATE Game_settings SET setting_value = 'High' WHERE setting_id = 1;
UPDATE Game_profiles SET game_id = 2 WHERE profile_id = 3;
